CustomField.formula: IF( pse__Estimated_Hours__c - pse__Actual_Hours__c < 0, 0, /* Never allow this field to go below 0 */ pse__Estimated_Hours__c - pse__Actual_Hours__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The estimated number of hours remaining to complete this task. Derived from estimated hours and actual hours.
CustomField.label: Hours Remaining
